alert.note: Alert for Davison; Hanson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 7:55AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Mitchell. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, the higher banks overflow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon and continue rising to 19.5 feet early next Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 AM CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu James River Mitchell 17.0 16.9 Mon 7 AM CDT 17.2 17.4 17.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1100 AM CDT.
